name: Guns & Fishes
description:
Guns and Fishes is a fish-paced shooter that puts you in the role of The diver who just wants to rescue precious corals for his fishes. Fight in various maps like roofs, tricky corridors and even more roofs! Diver (aside from being a pro diver) can jump and glide on walls, use multiple guns, endure multiple gunshots and hook on objects (if you can find his harpoon). Use your fish allies as ammo and bring an end to the evil shark gang.



Gameplay features:

Action-Platform 3-4 hour gameplay time
Fight against various members of shark gang
Challenge yourself using speedrun timer
Use jumping skills such as wall gliding and jumping
